WorkItem.Description: It would be nice if the debugging worked the same for Windows 8 apps like it does for IE apps. For example, when I am working with typescript on a web project I can set a breakpoint in the ts file. With Windows 8 projects I have to open the js file and set the break point.
WorkItem.Summary: Debugging doesn't work the same with Win8 apps

Comments.Message:
Can you upload a simple repro project? This scenario is already supported. The Encyclopedia sample, for example, is a Win8 app where you can set breakpoints in the TypeScript.
